column2: "I wanted him to notice me more. To look at me. To be able to stand next to her...."
"To be able to make Master Gettemhart smile, to walk with him, I wanted to become her."
"Ten years ago, that wish I never wanted to become fulfilled..."
"Right in front of Master Gettemhart, she..."
"And he offered those words of comfort, \"There was nothing that we could have done\"\"."
"But I know, as well as Master Gettemhart knows..."
"That those words he used to console me...."
"Couldn't be any further from the truth."
"That is why I do not stand next to him. I am not qualified to do so."
"It's my punishment, a result of my avariousness."
"Master Gettemhart became consumed by revenge, and has never smiled since..."
"He stopped calling me by my real name, and started refering to me as \"Shina\"."
